sourceTooltips.live: This insight was generated in real-time using live AI services. It reflects the most current information and analysis.
sourceTooltips.curated: This insight comes from curated content. It provides reliable information from pre-verified sources when live services are unavailable.
sourceTooltips.offline: This insight is from offline content. It provides helpful information when you're not connected to the internet.

sourceTooltipsWithCache.curated: This insight comes from curated content (cached {{cacheAge}}). It provides reliable information from pre-verified sources when live services are unavailable.
sourceTooltipsWithCache.offline: This insight is from offline content (cached {{cacheAge}}). It provides helpful information when you're not connected to the internet.

integrationBanner.title: Integrations Required
integrationBanner.description: AI features require API keys. Configure integrations to enable live AI services.
integrationBanner.openSettingsHint: Opens settings to configure AI integrations
